cacheExpiry.label: Cache Expiration
cacheExpiry.unlimitedHint: Cache never expires. Limit ~100MB, least-used chapter cache evicted when exceeded.

backup.dialogNotSupportedSave: File save dialog is not supported in this environment
backup.dialogNotSupportedOpen: File open dialog is not supported in this environment
backup.importConfirm: Importing backup will overwrite all data in the app (bookshelf, groups, reading history, statistics and reading settings) and cannot be undone. Continue?
backup.importSuccess: Import succeeded. The app will close, please reopen to apply latest data
backup.errorParseBackupFailed: Failed to parse backup file, please check if the file is complete
backup.errorUnsupportedVersion: Backup file version is not supported by this app
backup.errorNotGoreadBackup: The backup file was not created by GoRead
backup.errorMissingData: Backup file is missing required data contents
